member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Razor.IRazorDocumentPropertiesService.DesignTimeOnly

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Razor.IRazorDocumentPropertiesService.DiagnosticsLspClientName
member.summary: The LSP client name that should get the diagnostics produced by this document; any other source will not show these diagnostics. For example, razor uses this to exclude diagnostics from the error list so that they can handle the final display. If null, the diagnostics do not have this special handling.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Razor.RazorCSharpFormattingInteractionService
member.summary: Enables Razor to utilize Roslyn's C# formatting service.

Returns the text changes necessary to format the document after the user enters a character. The position provided is the position of the caret in the document after the character been inserted into the document.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Razor.RazorDocumentPropertiesServiceWrapper.DiagnosticsLspClientName
member.summary: The LSP client name that should get the diagnostics produced by this document; any other source will not show these diagnostics. For example, razor uses this to exclude diagnostics from the error list so that they can handle the final display. If null, the diagnostics do not have this special handling.
